reason: Node 1.6 has no declared dependencies, but it explicitly relies on claims from nodes 1.3 ('each local smoothing is generated by a compactly supported Hamiltonian'), 1.4 (same for edge smoothings), and 1.5 (the composition/assembly). It should declare dependencies on 1.3, 1.4, and 1.5. Without these dependencies, the claim is an unsupported assertion rather than a verified consequence.
